'''Sunset-Blue Obsidian Fragment''' is a [[Consumable]] that can be found in [[Natlan]]. Collecting all 3 will allow the player to craft the [[Sunset-Blue Obsidian Ring]]. Each part has a chance to drop randomly from any [[Chest|Precious or Luxurious Chests]] in [[Atocpan]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* [[Adventure Rank]] 45 is required to craft this item into the Azure Obsidian Ring. Attempting to craft the ring without meeting the requirements displays the following message:
*; '''Adventure Rank too low. Cannot craft'''
